mapper.select: select a.BO as bo, a.TYPE as type, case when a.TYPE = 1 then b.ROUTER when a.TYPE = 2 then c.SHOP_ORDER when a.TYPE = 3 then d.ITEM when a.TYPE = 4 then e.DEVICE when a.TYPE = 5 then f.DEVICE_TYPE when a.TYPE = 6 then g.OPERATION else '' end as contextName, case when a.TYPE = 1 then b.ROUTER_DESC when a.TYPE = 2 then c.ORDER_DESC when a.TYPE = 3 then d.ITEM_DESC when a.TYPE = 4 then e.DEVICE_DESC when a.TYPE = 5 then f.DEVICE_TYPE_DESC when a.TYPE = 6 then g.OPERATION_DESC else '' end as contextDesc, a.QTY as qty from m_tool_group_attach a left join m_router b on a.CONTEXT_BO = b.BO LEFT JOIN m_shop_order c on a.CONTEXT_BO = c.BO LEFT JOIN m_item d on a.CONTEXT_BO = d.BO LEFT JOIN m_device e on a.CONTEXT_BO = e.BO LEFT JOIN m_device_type f on a.CONTEXT_BO = f.BO LEFT JOIN m_operation g on a.CONTEXT_BO = g.BO WHERE a.TOOL_GROUP_BO = #{toolGroupAttachQueryDTO.toolGroupBo} AND a.SITE = #{toolGroupAttachQueryDTO.site}

select a.TYPE as type, case when a.TYPE = 1 then b.ROUTER when a.TYPE = 2 then c.SHOP_ORDER when a.TYPE = 3 then d.ITEM when a.TYPE = 4 then e.DEVICE when a.TYPE = 5 then f.DEVICE_TYPE when a.TYPE = 6 then g.OPERATION else '' end as contextName, a.CONTEXT_BO as contextBo, a.QTY as qty from m_tool_group_attach a left join m_router b on a.CONTEXT_BO = b.BO LEFT JOIN m_shop_order c on a.CONTEXT_BO = c.BO LEFT JOIN m_item d on a.CONTEXT_BO = d.BO LEFT JOIN m_device e on a.CONTEXT_BO = e.BO LEFT JOIN m_device_type f on a.CONTEXT_BO = f.BO LEFT JOIN m_operation g on a.CONTEXT_BO = g.BO WHERE a.BO = #{id}
